name: noosphere-evm
description: End-to-end testing scripts for the Noosphere EVM protocol.

scripts.test:e2e: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -s client --names "ANVIL,DEPLOY,AGENT,CLIENT" -c "blue,yellow,magenta,green" "npm run anvil" "sleep 2 && npm run deploy" "sleep 5 && npm run agent" "sleep 8 && npm run client"
